JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Nordic Speaking Team Leader, Athens, Greece
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Work International, Stockholm, Sweden, is looking for a Nordic Speaking Team Leader, Athens, Greece.

Experience the Beauty of Athens!

Step into the thought of working just steps away from stunning beaches with crystal-clear waters. Picture yourself enjoying endless sunshine year-round, all while savoring the delicious flavors of Greek cuisine. If this sounds like your dream lifestyle, then it’s time to dive into the Mediterranean experience!

Work Details

In this role, you’ll lead a team of content moderators for a top Social Network platform, providing coaching, motivation, and guidance to help them excel. You’ll play a key role in developing your team’s skills and ensuring they succeed in a dynamic and rewarding environment.

Your 5 key responsibilities:
  • Team Management: Supervise a team of content moderators, ensuring the review and moderation of user-generated content (text, images, videos) on the platform.
  • Performance Monitoring: Continuously monitor team performance against KPIs, addressing any shortfalls and ensuring targets are met.
  • Coaching & Development: Coach, motivate, and develop Advisors, providing continuous skill development and career growth opportunities.
  • Recognition & Motivation: Recognize and reward outstanding team performance, ensuring alignment with company values and mission.
  • Issue Resolution: Communicate client/campaign issues to the Operations Manager and take appropriate actions to improve client satisfaction.


Benefits for you:
  • Accommodation support: Help with the relocation process and free accommodation provided for the first month!
  • Competitive Wages: Enjoy very competitive pay and job stability.
  • Training: Fully paid training to set you up for success.
  • Healthcare: Access private healthcare for peace of mind.
  • Growth Opportunities: Continuous learning and career development.
  • Diverse Culture: Work in a safe, friendly, diverse, and tech-driven environment.
  • Team Spirit & Wellness Program: Join an international team with celebrations, skill-building initiatives, and team events, while enjoying the EverBetter wellness program, including an on-site fitness room and a personal trainer.


Requirements
  • Proficient level in either: Danish, Swedish, Norwegian, Finnish (C2)
  • Good English (at least C1) both verbal and written
  • Excellent attention to detail and ability to identify subtle nuances in content that may violate policies.
  • High Level of Self-Motivation and Analytical Thinking
  • Above average target achievement in the most important project KPIs.
  • EU Citizenship or Valid Work Permit for Greece
  • Education: Preferably a College Degree and/or Related Work Experience


Working in Greece

Greece offers the perfect blend of history, culture, sunshine, and an affordable lifestyle. With Athens being a safe, vibrant city offering great food, low cost of living, and a high quality of life, it’s no wonder it’s a top choice for expats. Explore ancient landmarks, experience rich culture, and enjoy modern living—all within the backdrop of the Mediterranean Sea.

About Our client

With 170,000 associates worldwide, our client powers the best experiences for over 750 of the world’s leading digital-first brands. Using innovative solutions, advanced technology, and expert support, they ensure smooth and meaningful interactions while meeting the unique needs of their clients on a global scale!

Apply in 30 seconds – we will contact you within 48h!

Read more about the vacancy and apply online:

https://www.workinternational.com/job/team-leader-nordic-athens-greece/


Work International is a Nordic recruitment agency that helps people find, apply, and land their dream jobs abroad. Through partnerships with world-leading employers, we offer safe working conditions, attractive relocation packages and amazing work opportunities.
